thread.title: nice hotel in a great location
thread.title_full: nice hotel in a great location - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: cask51454
title: nice hotel in a great location
text: this was my 8th stay at this hotel...has everything i need....gym, wifi, and coffee in the morning. staff is always very friendly and helpful. love the cookies they offer every afternoon and evening only wish they had real milk to go with the coffee (there's artificial cream) but i always just go into the restaurant and take what i need for my coffee!
